title: Coconut, fruit & chia seed breakfast bars

ingredients.item: 75g Waitrose 1 Perfectly Soft Dried Pear, diced

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 160Â°C, gas mark 3. Line a 20 x 30cm tin with baking paper.
Place the oats, rice pops, rice flour, coconut, berry mix, chia seeds and dried pear in a large bowl.
Whisk the rapeseed oil, eggs and syrup together, then stir into the dry ingredients and mix well.
Spoon into the prepared tin and level the surface. Bake for 35-40 minutes until golden and firm. Leave in the tin to cool completely. Slice into 24 squares.
